speech: I’m glad I could help. Take care, and I’m here whenever you need me!
Thank you for sharing. Remember, you’re not alone. Have a great day!
Take care, and don’t hesitate to reach out if you need support again.
Goodbye for now! Stay safe and take care of yourself.
Goodbye for now! Stay well and take care of yourself.
Thank you for talking to me! Feel free to come back whenever.
It was nice talking with you! Wishing you all the best!
Wishing you happiness and peace! Come back anytime you need help.
